Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Archer
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Archer and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 47th/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Archer and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 47th/Archer.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
